author: davidillsley
msg: Maven2 development being done on branch. I have deleted these poms to reduce confusion.
prevent StringIndexOutOfBounds exception if ';' is not found
need to call validateSystemPredefinedPhases from createDefaultConfigurationContext, TODO: does PhasesInfo really belong under deployment package??
Adding new WS-Addressing Default Action Pattern helper methods for non WSDL based configuration.
Consider inherited implementation methods and SEI interface methods during validation of an implementation bean.

Changes related to AXIS2-1516. The wsa:To and wsa:ReplyTo headers are now omitted if they contain a wsa anonymous address. This applies to the 2005/08 adressing namespace only. In addition, the RelationshipType attribute is now omitted if the value is wsa reply. This applies to both namespaces.
Improve method vs. operation handling in MDQ.  Also improve support for partial wsdl.
Adding fix to read correct defaults for ResponseWrapper Annotation.
Contributor: Rich Scheuerle and Gordon Kuo
Make sure the content-id for attachments is preserved
Additional test: Server throws WebServiceException...client should throw SOAPFaultException with same message string.
Make isAddressingHeaderAlreadyAvailable work sensibly for wsa:relatesTo headers.
Reduced the trace messages for object serialization to improve performance with trace enabled
Patch submitted by Ming Cheung.  Add java security access control call
Adding another util method to create an instance of EPR from an XML fragment given as a string.
Misc Changes that are the foundation for legacy exception support.
Add new AddressingModule class to configure the handlers.
Fix Message "getParent" code, which in turn correct the JAX-WS MTOM optimization.
Fix to prevent overwriting of OperationDescription objects.
Added additional WSGen tests.  These force a different flow (no ObjectFactory classes, defaults for missing annotations)
Added legacy exception detection, marshalling and demarshalling.  Corrected @WebFault faultBean defaults.  Added/changed some tests.
Improve consumability by throwing an AxisFault if there is
no MessageReceiver configured for the selected AxisOperation.
Dispatch<JAXB> Message mode support for sync and async.  Plus additional tests.
Exceptions that occur as a result of the unmarhsalling the async response.  This fixes
that along with adding some additional debug.
Fixing errors related to cancelling a polling request.
Add new test for changes related to AXIS2-1967
Applying patch for AXIS2-1956 sent by sumedha.
AddressingFinalInHandler should save reference parameters as OMElements.
- This commit does not include xdocs changes
- I have comment one test case since I didnt find a way to fix that (HandlerExecutionTest)
Please let me know if I have missed any changes you have made either to trunk or to the branch

Don't ignore test failures by default as part of the build!  Note that jaxws is also ignoring test failures, but as those tests are currently failing, that properties file will be udpated once the tests are all passing again.
Adding ClassFinder interface to read JAXB Classes from a jar file.
Use Transformer to get an XMLStreamReader from a DOMSource
Refactor config code in the AddressingOutHandler.
- Chathra please double check whether I have done any mistake
Catching Throable where ever we use Class.forName in jaxws.
need to exclude saaj from jdk 1.4 build
- removed unnecessary sync block in ConfigurationContext , we do not need to synchronize hashtable since there are synchronize by default
Deprecate a class that is not used.
1.Add support to restriction enumeration for handling QNames
change the attribute value according to the namespace
2.Add support to elements refering for an another element having maxoccures > 1 (i.e. arrayType)
Update groupId/version for woden to use new snapshots from Jeremy

Added a log correlation field to the MessageContext so that it is easier to match related entries within a log file.  Using the field (accessible through the getLogCorrelationID(), getLogIDString(), or toString() methods) should provide increased log readability irrespective of thread switches or message persistence/restart.  I'm sure that I didn't catch all of the log entries that should make use of the id.
fixing build break due to woden API change
reviewing and committing changes in Axis2 JIRA AXIS2-2021. Thanks Marietta
reviewed and committing changes requested in JIRA AXIS2-1934
Applying patch sent by sumedha for AXIS2-1956
Adding test resources sent by sumedha
Improved the helper method to support new features
Improved performance and processing of XMLSpineImpl
Added MDQ support for overloaded operations
Adding Set Method to JAXWS Factory Registry.
Fix to allow clients/other layers that use the OperationClient directly (as opposed to going through the ServiceClient) to function correctly with sync 2-way messaging and RM enabled.
Small change to ensure that exception marshalling complies with JAX-WS 10.2.2.3
Don't copy the soap action into the request context for the proxy.
If we have an OperationDescription, use that as a fall back in the
scenario where there is no soap action in the request context.
Fixed the issue 2007 and 2024. set xsi:nill="1" when writing to the xml stream.
Add a null pointer check when seting the complex type
we need to change cache service path whenever we change context path
fixed some bugs in helper mode
Reviewed and committing patch in AXIS2-2031 JIRA issue. Thanks Marietta
SOAPFaultException Detail marshalling/demarshalling, SOAPFaultException w/ WebService Provider support, tests etc.
Fixed NPE in JAXWS Dispatch mode=PAYLOAD
Need to catch FileNotFoundException when client attempts to retrieve WSDL at invalid location
Bug fix for improper placement of wsdl definition
Enable validation errors found in annotations and/or WSDL to be thrown; enable additional validation checks for annotations and WSDL
Fix for AXIS2-2029 - AxisMessageContext missing MC_HTTP_SERVLETRESPONSE Property
Fix for AXIS2-2005 - NullPointerException when undeploying/redeploying
Fix for AXIS2-2023 - Generation of soap:address in wsdl files
Fix for AXIS2-1828 - Change DeploymentEngine and RepositoryListener fields and methods from private to protected
oops we are not throwing any exception when a service is trying to expose a transport which is not available.
fixed a problem in helper mode

I found issues when we specify servicePath and contexRt parameters in axis2.xml , there we are not doing the logic correctly. Therefore I completely removed hard coded servicepath and context path from AxisConfiguration and move the logic to ConfigurationContextFactory.
Integration test fail is fixed by fixing the Jettison
Making use of the jettison version given in the project.properties
Change validator to allow java.lang.String Provider implementations.
@WebResult header processing, doc/lit wrapped + header @WebParam/@WebResult, plus other related marshalling issue
Create FaultDescription for all thrown exceptions...even if the exception does not have a @WebFault annotation
AsyncResponse.get() now caches the returned object.  This avoids a reparse of the message.  Updated ParallelAsyncTests to validate
fixing the brocken links at tools page
WSDL Description property on JAX-WS MessageContext should be a URI per the JAXWS spec, page 111, Table 9.2: Standard MessageContext properties
Adding code to fix RequestWrapper annotation default. Also fixing NPE in shcemaReader.
Add properties to MessageContext per JAX-WS spec section 9

Fixed a problem with the HTTP (and probably other) return codes for faults which occur while in the JAXWS layer not being set properly.  The MessageContext created as the result of a fault in the JAXWS layer will now be attached to an AxisFault and propagated back down to the transport in a manner that is consistent with how other faults flow within the system.  Instead of creating a new MessageContext, the fault handling code will simply extract the existing MessageContext from the fault and use that for the rest of the processing.
Reviewed and committing changes in JIRA AXIS2-2036
Identified error and made corrections. Thanks Sameera for JIRA AXIS2-1959
- We do not need to thw exception inside the DependencyManager
Applied the patch given at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AXIS2-2049 with some minor modifications.
Means that exception messages from ws-addressing faults are more descriptive.
Means that exception messages from ws-addressing faults are more descriptive.
Fix for integration test failure... need to screw committing head on more tightly!
Improve null handling in AxisService and AxisEngine
Enable validation errors for JAX-WS provider problem that were temporarily allowed
Dustin's patch for cleaning up this bit of error handling.
Dustin's patch for the reflection based DBC converter.
Clean up access to the operation context map.
- Now we have only one parameter to enable/disable REST
First pass at a message bundle for the addressing module
First pass at a message bundle for the addressing module
Sam's fix for a wrong import that was causing issues.
Extend the simple contentent extension support for user defined simple types
reviewed and committing patch in JIRA AXIS2-2065
- rather than just keeping parent option object inside opclient , changed to create new option putting parent option as parent.
Fix for AXIS2-1848 - Upgrade SimpleHttpServer to HttpCore 4.0-alpha3
